name: Build Them Bots
description:
Help a tired engineer test her computer program! The program will display a robot for you to recreate. Made for the Godot Wild Jam  # 53

Controls:

Left and right arrows - navigation

Enter/ space - select

Try not to use the mouse outside of the main menu, otherwise it gets wonky.

Sorry for the jank/ lack of polish, I only had a day to get my entry in!

Endless mode will have to be added another time as it is 4:30am :)

Credits

Dialog system (Dialogic) by Emilio Coppola and others

Music by Starfeesh

Crowd SoundFX - InspectorJ

Rest of the sounds are from Cyberleaf-ModernUISFX kit
